fullForm: Indian Council of Agricultural Research All India Entrance Examination for Admission Postgraduate
eligibility: Candidates must have a Bachelor’s degree in the relevant field from a recognized university with a minimum required percentage as specified by ICAR. Detailed eligibility criteria are provided in the official information bulletin.
coursesLinked: Master’s degree programmes in Agricultural and Allied Sciences at participating universities

faqs.question: Who conducts the ICAR AIEEA PG exam?
faqs.answer: The ICAR AIEEA PG exam is conducted by the National Testing Agency (NTA) on behalf of the Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR).
